creator: kwk_kwk@mail.ru
text:
Need to add support for customizing parameter values:
Print area
Print titles (Rows repeated at top, Rows repeated at left)

See: Sheet tab at the Excel Page Setup Dialog.

retargeting to 2.0-dev series.  Please upgrade to at least 1.5.1 (latest
production version).  New features will be incorporated in either the 2.0 or 3.0
release, no edition prior.
creator: poi-support@buni.org

text:
1.9-dev is a nightly snapshot or CVS build for what will eventually be 2.0 once
its ready.  If the particular print options you're looking for aren't supported
yet one of two things will/can happen:

1. Someone will see this and say "hey cool, I'd like to work on this".
2. You can work on it.

-Andy
creator: poi-support@buni.org

text:
Global printing options are supported since POI-2.5

See HSSFWorkbook#setPrintArea and HSSFWorkbook#setRepeatingRowsAndColumns

http://poi.apache.org/spreadsheet/quick-guide.html#PrintArea2
http://poi.apache.org/spreadsheet/quick-guide.html#Repeating

Regards,
Yegor
creator: yegor@dinom.ru
